law.catch_line: Prohibited acts by students -- Rights of student -- Administrative remedies.

text.section:
A student shall have the right to carry out an activity described in any of paragraphs
to (d) of subsection (2) of this section, if the student does not:
Maintain order and discipline;
Prevent disruption of the educational process; and
Determine educational curriculum and assignments; (a) Infringe on the rights of the school to:
Harass other persons or coerce other persons to participate in the activity; or
Otherwise infringe on the rights of other persons.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 294, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
